item.description:
Happy holidays to all!

I am inviting everybody to join me

for our December meet up at Marina's place in Webster, Mass. on December 27, at 2 P.M. The theme of our meet up will be a Russian Tea Party!

The party is for moms only. Sorry. My modest apartment isnt suited for young children. It will give us a chance to relax and get to know each other. For directions and confirmation please call me at 774 289 2002 .

Also, does anyone have a samovar? Iam afraid I dont have one. You are welcome to bring anything you wish.

Please come and enjoy the holiday spirit!

Best,
Marina.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: DECEMBER GROUP MEET UP
